title: What are some of the greatest design philosophies? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are tons of good philosophies and adages, but my all-time favorite are Dieter Rams 10 principals of good design. If you’re unfamiliar, Dieter Rams is worth learning more about. There’s even a documentary about him now. But according to him, good design… Is innovativeMakes a product usefulIs aestheticMakes a product understandableIs unobtrusiveIs honestIs long-lastingIs thorough down to the last detailIs environmentally friendlyInvolves as little design as possibleYou can read about these more in-depth here. Thanks for the A2A!

“Our guiding principle was that design is neither an intellectual nor a material affair, but simply an integral part of the stuff of life, necessary for everyone in a civilized society.” -Walter Gropius
